abstract: Trinity Church in Manhattan makes shareholder request to sporting goods retailer Cabela's to stop selling guns that can fire more than eight rounds without reloading.
lead_paragraph: The Manhattan church is making a shareholder proposal that the retailer stop selling guns that can fire more than eight rounds without reloading.

headline.main: Trinity Church Campaigns Against Some Gun Sales at Cabela’s
headline.print_headline: Trinity Church Proposes Shareholder Measure Against Some Gun Sales at Cabela’s

snippet: The Manhattan church is making a shareholder proposal that the retailer stop selling guns that can fire more than eight rounds without reloading.
